text:
Apstra | UI Engineer, Visualization Engineer, UI/UX Designer | Menlo Park, CA or Remote (US)| https://www.apstra.com/

We are a well funded company in the networking infrastructure automation space. The product is in production and we're currently expanding our UI team to satisfy customers' demand for new features.

Technologies: ClojureScript + Reagent + re-frame (2/3 of codebase), React + MobX + D3 (1/3 of codebase).

To apply, send an email to kishanov at apstra.com (my email, I'm a UI team lead here)
